item.title: 新加坡石油大亨 OK Lim 被判处 17 年半监禁
item.description: 新加坡石油大亨林翁权（Lim Oon Kuin）因欺骗汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）和唆使伪造证件而被判处 17 年半监禁，此案震动了新加坡商品交易界，并给银行造成了巨大损失。【原文：Singapore oil tycoon Lim Oon Kuin has been sentenced to 17 and a half years in jail for cheating HSBC Holdings Plc and instigating forgery in a case that has shaken the city-state’s commodity-trading community and left banks nursing hefty losses.】

item.title: 不温不火的欧洲季度收益阻碍了 2025 年经济复苏的希望
item.description: 欧洲公司的收入在第三季度未能恢复，导致明年的盈利预期被下调。【原文：Revenue at European companies failed to recover in the third quarter, triggering cuts to earnings expectations into next year.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在经历 6 月以来最差单周走势后将迎来反弹
镍矿商普罗尼计划重启新喀里多尼亚生产
item.description: 新喀里多尼亚镍矿开采商普罗尼资源公司（Prony Resources New Caledonia）已让员工返回现场，准备在法国领土暴乱引发的六个月停产后重新开始产出。【原文：Nickel miner Prony Resources New Caledonia has brought its staff back onsite as it prepares to restart output after a six-month suspension triggered by riots in the French territory.】

item.title: 肯特称澳大利亚央行的政策效应并不比其他经济体强
item.description: 一位储备银行高级官员表示，尽管澳大利亚家庭背负着大量浮动利率抵押贷款债务，但其货币政策效应并不比其他发达经济体更强。【原文：Australia’s monetary policy effect is no more potent than those of other advanced economies, even though its households carry a large stock of variable-rate mortgage debt, a senior Reserve Bank official said.】

item.title: 碧昂斯将加入 Netflix 的 NFL 首秀，为推动大型活动运筹帷幄
item.description: 碧昂斯（Beyoncé）将在 Netflix 公司今年圣诞节首次进军美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）比赛直播期间的中场表演中担任主角，这对于一家在体育直播和大型活动方面下了大赌注的美国公司来说是一个重大收获。【原文：Beyoncé will headline the halftime show during Netflix Inc.’s maiden foray into live NFL games this Christmas, a big score for a US company betting big on live sports and mega-events.】

item.title: 中国汽油出口降至四月以来最低水平
item.description: 由于炼油厂缩减运营规模，加上假期刺激了本地需求，中国的汽油出口量降至 4 月份以来的最低点。【原文：Gasoline exports from China sank to the lowest since April as refiners scale back operations and a holiday boosted local demand.】

item.title: 印度天然气供应商股价下跌，原因是供应削减将冲击利润率
item.description: 在政府连续第二个月削减天然气分配后，印度城市天然气分销商的股票周一暴跌，并引发分析师下调其评级。【原文：Indian city gas distributors’ stocks tumbled Monday after the government cut allocations of natural gas for a second month, triggering analyst downgrades.】

item.title: 中国抑制出口的举措扰乱了铝库存和价格
item.description: 中国取消出口税收减免后，铝行业争先恐后地评估其对供应流的影响，中国公司股票大幅下跌，而国际同行则反弹。【原文：China’s cancellation of tax relief on exports has left the aluminum industry scrambling to assess the impact on supply flows, with Chinese companies suffering steep stock declines while their international peers rally.】

item.title: 石油交易商因公司遭美伊制裁而面临诉讼
item.description: 这位试图从壳牌公司和埃克森美孚公司购买英国天然气资产的能源交易商被起诉，指控他挪用了一家伊朗石化公司的资金，该公司后来被禁止在美国开展业务。【原文：The energy trader seeking to buy UK gas assets from Shell Plc and Exxon Mobil Corp. was sued over allegations that he diverted money from an Iranian petrochemical company that was later banned from doing business in the US.】

item.title: 美国油泵价格创下三年新低，假日旅游热潮卷土重来
item.description: 全国平均汽油价格将跌破令人怀念的每加仑 3 美元的基准价，正好赶上感恩节，届时假日旅游预计将回升到流行前的水平。【原文：National average gasoline prices are set to fall below the nostalgic $3 a gallon benchmark just in time for Thanksgiving, when holiday travel is expected to climb back to prepandemic levels.】

item.title: 蒂姆-伯纳斯-李希望重拾互联网
item.description:
万维网的发明者肩负着一项值得称赞的使命，那就是让每个人都能控制自己的在线数据。他正在进行一场艰苦的战斗。【原文：

The inventor of the World Wide Web is on a laudable mission to give everyone control of their online data. He’s fighting an uphill battle.

】

item.title: 贝莱德在沙特总部获批数周后获得阿布扎比许可
item.description: 贝莱德公司获得了在阿布扎比开展业务的商业许可，这是这家资产管理公司希望深化与整个地区联系的最新迹象。【原文：BlackRock Inc. received a commercial license to operate in Abu Dhabi, the latest sign that the asset manager is looking to deepen its ties across the region.】

item.title: 调查显示德国经济产出今年将再次萎缩
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，经济学家们已经放弃了德国能够避免连续第二年产出萎缩的希望。【原文：Economists have given up hope that Germany can avoid a second consecutive year of shrinking output, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 法国预算走向与勒庞的 "鸡肉游戏
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）可能会让该法案成为法律，也可能会在不信任投票中推翻政府，从而引发混乱。【原文：France’s budget is advancing through fractious parliamentary debates toward a precipice in December when far-right leader Marine Le Pen can let the bill become law, or trigger chaos by toppling the government in a no-confidence vote.】

item.title: 中国股市因提升股东价值的指导方针而反弹
item.description: 中国和香港股市从上周的大跌中反弹，原因是交易商重新评估了进一步刺激政策的前景，以及中国关于提高企业估值的指导意见。【原文：Equities in China and Hong Kong rebounded from last week’s selloff as traders reassess an outlook for further stimulus and the country’s guidance on boosting corporate valuation.】

item.title: 印度债券出现自加入指数以来最大的资金外流
item.description: 海外投资者减持印度债券的速度至少是 6 月份以来最快的，因为美国收益率的上升削弱了这个亚洲国家固定收益证券的吸引力。【原文：Overseas investors are cutting their holdings of Indian bonds at the fastest pace since at least June, as rising US yields damp the appeal of the Asian nation’s fixed-income securities.】

item.title: 期权交易员因利率担忧平仓看涨美股的赌注
item.description: 在美国总统大选前后几天进行的一些看涨交易正在平仓，因为降息放缓的前景有助于阻止股市上涨。【原文：Some of the bullish trades put on in the days around the US presidential election are being unwound as the prospect of slower interest-rate cuts have helped halt the stock rally.】

item.title: 野村的交易客户在市场操纵调查后回归
item.description: 据知情人士透露，野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Some clients of Nomura Holdings Inc. are restarting business with the Japanese brokerage after it took steps to address concerns arising from a regulatory probe into market manipulation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 里昂证券和花旗对印度股市前景看法不一
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚反对党阻止留学生人数上限
item.description: 在反对党政治家决定投票反对拟议的法律之后，澳大利亚的国际学生人数上限计划似乎将受阻，尽管他们曾多次敦促削减移民人数。【原文：Australia’s plan to cap international student numbers looks set to be blocked after opposition politicians decided to vote against the proposed laws, even after they had repeatedly urged cuts to migration.】

item.title: 必和必拓警告澳大利亚矿业尚未准备好迎接低成本竞争者
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）澳大利亚负责人表示，澳大利亚无法依赖其传统的矿业出口市场，也没有准备好迎接低成本竞争者的新时代。【原文：BHP Group’s Australia chief said the nation can’t rely on its traditional mining export markets and is unprepared for a new era of lower-cost competitors.】

item.title: 泰国经济因出口和刺激政策增长 3%，超出预期
item.description: 泰国经济在第三季度的增长速度超过预期，这主要得益于出口的改善和政府支出的增加，政府正计划进一步刺激经济以保持增长势头。【原文：Thailand’s economy expanded faster than expected in the third quarter, driven by improving exports and and spending by the government, which is planning further stimulus to sustain the growth momentum.】

item.title: 高盛称 "买入黄金"，因央行买入，美联储将于 25 年减息
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）将黄金列为 2025 年最热门的大宗商品交易之一，并称在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统期间，黄金价格可能会延续涨势。【原文：Gold will rally to a record next year on central-bank buying and US interest rate cuts, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., which listed the metal among top commodity trades for 2025 and said prices could extend gains during Donald Trump’s presidency.】

item.title: 阿达尼的绿色能源业务寻求重振美元债券交易
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团在上个月最后一刻推迟了绿色能源业务的美元债券发行，目前正寻求重启该业务的美元债券交易。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate is looking to revive a dollar bond deal from its green energy business, after postponing such an offering last month at the last moment.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利和高盛因中国经济增长放缓而下调对中国股市的看法
item.description: 由于持续的通货紧缩压力和地缘政治紧张局势给全球第二大股票市场的盈利前景蒙上阴影，华尔街券商对中国股市的态度变得更加谨慎。【原文：Wall Street brokerages have turned more cautious on Chinese stocks as persistent deflationary pressures and geopolitical tensions cloud the outlook for earnings in the world’s second-largest equity market.】

item.title: WH 集团将在美国上市时发售最多 20% 的史密斯菲尔德股票
item.description: 全球最大的猪肉生产商 WH 集团有限公司在香港证券交易所提交的一份文件中称，该公司计划将其子公司史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods Inc.【原文：The world’s biggest pork producer WH Group Ltd. plans to list up to 20% of shares of its subsidiary Smithfield Foods Inc. on the New York Stock Exchange or NASDAQ, it said in a Hong Kong stock exchange filing.】

item.title: 菲律宾开始利率掉期交易以深化债券市场
item.description: 菲律宾周一启动了一个新的利率互换市场，以促进债券交易和流动性，作为发展资本市场改革的一部分。【原文：The Philippines kicked off on Monday a new interest rate swap market to boost bond trading and liquidity as part of reforms to develop its capital market.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格九个月来首次下降
item.description: 首尔的公寓价格九个月来首次下滑，最新数据支持了韩国央行上个月的政策转向，并预示着明年货币宽松政策有可能加速。【原文：Apartment prices in Seoul slipped for the first time in nine months, in the latest data supporting the Bank of Korea’s policy pivot last month and foreshadowing the potential for an acceleration of monetary easing next year.】

item.title: 上田对暗示日本央行加息时机持谨慎态度日元走软
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫在备受关注的评论中避免明确暗示将在 12 月的会议上加息，这使得日元走软。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda avoided giving a clear hint that he will raise interest rates at a December meeting during closely watched comments that weakened the yen.】
